alert.note: Alert for Lonoke (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 31 at 3:25PM CDT until March 31 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN LONOKE COUNTY... At 325 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Meto, or near Lonoke, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Lonoke... South Bend... Parnell... Furlow... Fairview in Lonoke County... TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
